column3: Financial Inclusion under Jan Dhan Yojana (% increase in No frill accounts)
column5: Total Disbursement of Mudra Loan per One Lakh Population
column6: District Plan Expenditure (General + SCP + TSP + OTSP) against Budgeted
column7: Unspent Balance of DPC Fund with Local Bodies Against Allotted DPC Budget to that
column8: % of Total Revenue Income to Revenue Expenditure (ULBs)
column9: Publication of ULBs Annual Accounts in Time   ( FY  2021-22 )
